alert.note: Alert for Beadle; Brule; Gregory; Jerauld (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 7:19AM MST until November 09 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, freezing drizzle is expected. A light glaze of ice is possible. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations generally a half an inch or less and ice accumulations around a tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, especially Thursday morning. * WHERE...Beadle, Gregory, Jerauld and Brule Counties. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until noon CST today. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
